criteria.title: Module Completion and Badge Collection (40 points - Total) 🏅📚

criteria.text: 🎯 The module 'Get Started with TypeScript' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 The module 'Declare Variable Types in TypeScript' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 The module 'Implement Interfaces in TypeScript' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 The module 'Develop Typed Functions by Using TypeScript' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 The module 'Declare and Instantiate Classes in TypeScript' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 The module 'Define Generics in TypeScript' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 The module 'Access External Libraries From TypeScript' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 The module 'Organize Code Using TypeScript Namespaces' is completed and the corresponding badge is earned and added to the Markdown compilation.
🎯 A Markdown file listing all the earned badges is created, each badge is linked to its corresponding module for easy reference.

🎯 A personal reflection for each completed module is provided, what is learned and how it contributes to the student's development skills is discussed. This reflection is thoughtful, demonstrating a clear understanding of the module's content and its practical application in real-world scenarios.

🎯 If any changes are made to the file after the submission deadline, a full penalty of 100% is applied. The last modified date of the deployed document can be verified using the `document.lastModified` command in the browser console.
